title: They Can’t Spin Their Way Out of This Disaster (Ep 1328)
description:
In this episode, I address Joe Biden’s awful close to the dreadful DNC and the false praise heaped upon him by media hacks. I also address an email I received by an insider about the disaster unfolding in this liberal city. 

News Picks:

A definitive compilation of Joe Biden’s lies. 

Remember when Bob Gates said Biden was wrong on every major national security issue? 

California is a socialist utopia, and a real world disaster.


AOC humiliates herself again and makes another ridiculous comparison.


Liberals melt down after the Trump team buys an ad in the Washington Post.


Biden can’t function without a teleprompter.
